bibl.title: Texts on the Tables: The Tabulae Iliacae in their Hellenistic Literary Context.
bibl.note: I. Tabulae illitteratae? - II. Mastering Theodorean techne [comparison of the inscriptions with P. Oxy. XXXII, 2619 (= M.-P.3 1485.3; LDAB 3973)]. - III. Poetic figures and figurative poems. - IV. Theorizing Theodorus [with help of Pliny the Elder, HN 34.83 and of Posidippus, P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309 (= M.-P.3 1435.01; LDAB 3852), coll. x, 38 - xi, 5, 67A-B). - V. Conclusion: 'The serious lover of Greek literature'?
bibl.seg: SQUIRE Michael, Texts on the Tables: The Tabulae Iliacae in their Hellenistic Literary Context.
